name: 18th Edition of International Conference on Catalysis, Chemical Engineering and Technology
content: Join us at the 18th International Conference on Catalysis, Chemical Engineering and Technology, in Paris, France from June 17-19, 2024\. This Catalysis Conferences 2024 brings together chemists, engineers, researchers, industry professionals, and students from around the world. Under the theme "Stretching the Horizons of Expertise in Chemical Engineering's Big Molecular World," Chemical Engineering Conferences 2024 provides a unique platform to share thoughts, research work, and insights in catalysis, chemical engineering, and technology. With detailed lectures, keynote speeches, oral and poster presentations, and panel discussions by leading international experts. Network with senior management, decision-makers, and peers, and explore collaboration opportunities. Green Chemistry and Catalysis Conferences 2024 emphasizes application-oriented research to bridge the gap between scientific discoveries and industry needs. Your expertise and participation will enrich the conference and contribute to a vibrant atmosphere of knowledge sharing. Register now and be part of this Chemistry Conferences 2024 experience in the heart of Paris.
